body.value:
Dear Mr Innis.

           I have long
recognized your native ability,
admired the thoroughness with
which that ability has been cul-
tivated, I now desire to contribute
a trifle to another quality you
posses, no matter how smart a
man may be, it is always a
good thing to be smarter, therefore
I contribute this Bottle of Horse
Radish.

[Footer]
Roslyn.
Christmas 1886

[Signature]
Scottie
